dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.stat.CustomerBillingStatistic
dataStructure.description:
Collected data derived from CustomerBills. It is defined by CustomerBillingStatisticSpecification.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerBillingStatistic

child.name: statisticForPeriod
child.description:
The period for which the statistic is calculated.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: statisticForPeriod

child.name: customerBillingStatisticBalance

This association end is navigable
